system.note: A Precursor to the boltgun, fires rocket-propelled shells that ignite in the barrel and spin as a result of exhaust vents. Lacks the impact of a boltgun, but has little recoil and is relatively quiet.

description.value:
Special: Tearing

Note: A Precursor to the boltgun, fires rocket-propelled shells that ignite in the barrel and spin as a result of exhaust vents. Lacks the impact of a boltgun, but has little recoil and is relatively quiet.
